codes.ADDR: Notification of a change of address.
codes.ATAC: Notification of new or amended terms and conditions for an account.
codes.COUP: Notification of new or amended contact details.
codes.INCH: Notification of any pertinent industry or market changes.
codes.MERG: Notification of a merger and any associated changes.
codes.OPEN: Notification of a change to opening hours.
codes.SSIS: Notification of a change to Standing Settlement Instructions (SSIs).
codes.SUSP: Notification of a process suspension due to an incident.
codes.SYST: Request for access to a system.
codes.TERM: Notification of termination of a service, such as an account closure.

description: Specifies the notification type, as published in an external notification type code set.
name: ExternalNotificationType1Code
